TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputFile extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputFile Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputFile = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用服务器控件以处理将二进制或文本的文件从浏览器客户端上传到服务器。Use the server control to handle uploading binary or text files from a browser client to the server. 文件上传适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 3.02 或更高版本。File upload works with Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.02 or later. > [!NOTE] > 控件旨在使用仅在回发的情况下，不在异步回发的情况下在局部页面呈现期间。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 当你使用控件内部控件，必须上载该文件，通过使用控件是面板对象。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控制用于更新选定的区域，而不是使用回发中更新整个页面的页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)并[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 若要指定要上载的文件，请到文件 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") 控件的文本框中输入的完整路径。To specify the file to upload, enter the full path to the file (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") in the text box of the control. 此外可以通过单击选择的文件**浏览**按钮，再然后定位在**选择文件**对话框。You can also select the file by clicking the **Browse** button and then locating it in the **Choose file** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 属性的控件必须设置为"multipart/窗体-data"为此控件才能正常工作。The property of an control must be set to "multipart/form-data" for this control to work properly. 控件不具有回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not have a built-in way to post back to the server. 若要将文件上载到服务器，请使用方法对象中包含属性。To upload the file to the server, use the method of the object contained in the property. 此操作通常是事件处理方法中，例如，针对一个按钮单击。This operation is usually done in an event-handling method, such as for a button click. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用方法的类中，请确保指定根的路径 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt")。When you use the method of the class, make sure to specify a rooted path (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 行为中，可以指定方法[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)配置节`requireRootedSaveAsPath`属性。The behavior of the method can be specified in the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) configuration section with the `requireRootedSaveAsPath` attribute. 此特性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this attribute is `true`. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，然后使用使用未指定路径的方法将尝试将该文件置于`systemroot`\system32\inetsrv 目录。If you set this attribute to `false`, then using the method with no path specified will attempt to place the file in the `systemroot` \system32\inetsrv directory. 默认情况下，此目录是写保护;因此，可以不存在保存该文件。By default, this directory is write-protected; therefore, the file can not be saved there. 请确保提供由 ASP.NET 的目录使用你想要将文件存储的帐户的写入权限。Make sure to provide write permission for the account used by ASP.NET for the directory where you want to store the file. 上载大型文件时，使用`maxRequestLength`的属性[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)元素以增加允许的最大文件大小。When uploading large files, use the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element to increase the maximum allowable file size. 时的文件超过指定的大小，在浏览器中将生成 DNS 错误。A DNS error is generated in the browser when the file exceeds the specified size. 上传大型文件时，还可能会收到以下错误消息：You might also receive the following error message when uploading large files: aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520年) 被回收，因为内存消耗超过 460 MB （60%的可用 RAM)。aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM). 如果遇到此错误消息，增加的价值`memoryLimit`中的属性[processModel 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) Machine.config 文件的元素。If you encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the [processModel Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) element of the Machine.config file. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个简单的文件上传方案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a simple file upload scenario. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"文件"字符串。The "file" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/CS/htmlinputfilectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/VB/htmlinputfilectorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表，该列表用于约束用户可以选择的文件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of MIME encodings used to constrain the file types the user can select.

value.span: 用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表。

span.span: The comma-separated list of MIME encodings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可上传到服务器的文件类型。Use this property to specify the file type that can be uploaded to the server. 例如，若要限制为映像选择，将此属性设置"image / \*"。For example, to restrict the selection to images, set this property to "image/\*". > [!NOTE] > 支持此属性是依赖于浏览器的。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查你的浏览器以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property. 建议使用服务器端代码以确保该文件的预期类型。It is recommended that you use server-side code to ensure that the file is of the expected type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来限制用户选择图像文件以外的任何文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to restrict the user from selecting any file other than an image file. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。由于支持属性为依赖于浏览器的将执行服务器端检查以确保只有映像已上传。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. Because support for the property is browser-dependent, a server-side check is performed to ensure that only images are uploaded. 如果上传的文件不被视为引发异常类型。An exception is thrown if the uploaded file can not be read as an type. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从客户机上载的文件的文件路径的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of the file path for the file to upload from the client computer.
The maximum length of the file path.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可以为路径到要上载的文件输入的字符数的限制。Use this property to specify a limit for the number of characters that can be entered for the path to the file to upload. > [!NOTE] > 支持此属性是依赖于浏览器的。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查你的浏览器以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有指定编码的网页控件，属性设置为"multipart/窗体的数据"。If no encoding is specified for the Web page's control, the property is set to "multipart/form-data". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便`Title`属性将始终向每个自定义添加控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a `Title` attribute is always added to each custom control. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浏览器安全限制禁止从多个请求间保留此值。Browser security restrictions prevent this value from being maintained across multiple requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，若要启动的实用程序，将文件传输到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to initiate the utility that transfers the file to the server. 请注意，如果上传的文件，以字节为单位的大小超过值属性，该文件未上传。Note that if the size of the uploaded file in bytes exceeds the value of the property, the file is not uploaded. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取客户机上文件的完整路径。

span.span: Gets the full path of the file on the client's computer.

value.span: 客户端文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path of the client's file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索客户端的计算机 (例如"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") 上的文件的完整路径。The property retrieves the full path of the file on the client's computer (for example "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 当您需要了解该文件将提交该文件在计算机上的存储位置时，这很有用。This is useful when you need to know where the file is stored on the computer submitting the file. 此属性通常还用于确定原始文件名。This property is also commonly used to determine the original file name. 若要获取的原始文件名，分析此属性的值。To get the original file name, parse the value of this property. > [!NOTE] > 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 如果你尝试将值分配给此属性，引发。If you attempt to assign a value to this property, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示客户端的计算机上的文件的完整路径。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the full path of the file on the client's computer. 对于此示例正常工作，需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/CS/htmlinputfilevaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/VB/htmlinputfilevaluevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to this property.
